backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing site ownership, access control, user profiles, orders, and contact messages with authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old and new actor state types and provides a no-op migration that returns the existing state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for build and verification tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries of various frontend files for reference or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions, including light/dark mode OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router with routes, layout, and global error fallback handling for the React app.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard enforcing admin/owner access with Internet Identity login flow, ownership checks, and conditional rendering.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Bitcoin: Displays Bitcoin payment details for an order with copy-to-clipboard helpers for address, amount, and order ID.
frontend/src/components/error/GlobalErro: A React error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a fallback UI with reset support.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Provides the main site layout with header navigation, admin visibility logic, recent orders menu, and footer.
frontend/src/components/orders/RecentOrd: Shows a dropdown of recent user orders with statuses, using order history and detail queries.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Denom: Renders selectable gift card denomination cards with BTC pricing using live rate data.
Displays a callout highlighting the minimum and maximum supported USDT denominations.
A dropdown selector for choosing a USDT denomination from supported values.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Quant: Provides increment, decrement, and manual input controls for selecting a purchase quantity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor, reinitializing it when the Internet Identity changes and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBtcUsdtRate.ts: Fetches the BTC/USDT rate with caching, fallback handling, and periodic refresh using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout helpers, and persistent identity handling via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderHistory.ts: Loads and tracks persisted order history from storage with automatic updates on storage events.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderHistoryDetail: Fetches detailed order data for multiple order IDs using the backend actor and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for CRUD operations on orders and contact messages using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind and defines theme variables, including light/dark modes and Binance-inspired colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with react-query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing the service, features, and platform benefits using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminContactMes: Admin page that lists all customer contact messages in a table with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin page for viewing detailed order info and updating order status with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin overview page listing all orders with status badges and navigation to individual order details or messages.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays gift card catalog allowing users to select denomination and quantity, shows product details, and saves cart before navigating to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles order form submission, validates cart and user data, creates discounted BTC orders, and stores order snapshots while managing errors.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form for users to submit inquiries and handles success or error states using a backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Static FAQ page presenting common questions about Binance gift cards using an accordion layout.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalErrorFallbackPa: Global error fallback UI that displays error details, provides reload and home navigation options, and shows extra debug info in development.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero section, denomination callout, and feature highlights, directing users to browse the catalog or view pricing.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Displays a user's order history, loading states, and status badges by fetching summary and detailed order data.
frontend/src/pages/OrderStatusPage.tsx: Shows detailed status and payment info for a specific order, including BTC-to-USDT estimation and status icons.
frontend/src/pages/TrackOrderPage.tsx: Provides a form for users to enter an order ID and navigate to its status page, with basic validation and error display.
frontend/src/state/cartSession.ts: Provides helpers to save, load, and clear a cart session in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/state/orderHistory.ts: Manages a localStorage-backed order history with add, update, remove, and clear operations plus cross-tab sync.
frontend/src/utils/denominations.ts: Exports a fixed list of supported gift card denominations.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Formats and normalizes errors into user-friendly messages and provides helpers to classify backend, connectivity, and authorization errors.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatus.ts: Converts backend order statuses into simplified labels and badge variants for display.
frontend/src/utils/pricing.ts: Implements discounting and USDT/BTC conversion utilities with formatting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using URL and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, containers, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, issues, and required fixes for production load errors.
